I recently discovered "Gianna Nannini" and her song "Bello e Impossibile" has become a new favorite of mine. I think their powerful voices will make our bike ride even more memorable, and it might even make us feel like we're in an Italian opera!

Hey John,

I'm so glad you liked the Italian music recs! I had a feeling you would enjoy Eros Ramazzotti and Zucchero. And speaking of Italian tunes, have you checked out "Andrea Bocelli" and "Laura Pausini" yet? I think you'll really enjoy their work if you're looking for more classic Italian tunes.

As for French films, I absolutely loved "Amélie" and highly recommend giving it a watch if you haven't already seen it. Another classic French film that I've always enjoyed is "The 400 Blows". Have you seen either of them yet?

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts on those recs and to sharing more movie and music recommendations with you soon!

Mary ##

Hey John,
